title: nunu... why does he exist..? (butt hurt thread, idc)
body: i was cho and all game was nightmarishly counterjungled. he had the timers down to the second, and every time would just light up all my buffs.... and they invaded to start.... they had a strong invade team... and this is all in norms.... they didn't play like norms D: it was wood tier against maybe... silver? it was terrible D:!!!! is there counterplay to nunu? is there a reason he can do what he does without so much as a second glance? been like this ever since i can remember... D:
